skills.name: Spread Fire
skills.desc: Deals 1 <span style="color:#FF9999FF">Pyro DMG, deals <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">1 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby.

skills.name: Combined Fire
skills.desc: Deals 2 <span style="color:#FF9999FF">Pyro DMG and then separately performs "<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Prepare Skill" for <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combined Fire: Light Barrage and <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combined Fire: Piercing Salvo.

skills.name: Arkhe: Ousia
skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">After being damaged by characters with "Arkhe: Pneuma," this character will become <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Deactivated, and <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">cannot use skills until this Round ends.
